## ActivityFinishInfo type

Represents the data required for finishing an Activity.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ActivityFinishInfo = {
    $type?: string;
    Message?: string;
    NextActivityDueDate?: string;
    NextActivityTitle?: string;
    NextAssignee?: Link;
};
```
